languages.text: {n}Облик дворянина искажен гримасой ужаса. Из-за нее трудно угадать, нашито ли что-то на его лицо и есть ли в нем черты, родственные мстителю.{/n}

{n}The nobleman's visage is twisted in a grimace of terror. It is difficult to tell whether he has another person's face sewn onto his own or not — or if he bears any family resemblance to the attacker.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Облик дворянина искажен гримасой ужаса. Из-за нее трудно угадать, нашито ли что-то на его лицо и есть ли в нем черты, родственные мстителю.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The nobleman's face is twisted in a grimace of terror. It is difficult to say whether someone else's face is sewn onto his own or if there is any family resemblance to the attacker.{/n}

{n}The nobleman's visage is twisted in a grimace of terror. It is difficult to tell whether he has another person's face sewn onto his own or not — or if he bears any family resemblance to the attacker.{/n}
{n}The nobleman's face is twisted in a grimace of terror. It is difficult to say whether there is any similarity between the face stitched on him and the face of his attacker.{/n}

{n}The nobleman's visage is twisted in a grimace of terror. It is difficult to tell whether he has another person's face sewn onto his own or not — or if he bears any family resemblance to the attacker.{/n}

{n}The nobleman's visage is twisted in a grimace of terror. It is difficult to tell whether he has another person's face sewn onto his own or not — or if he bears any family resemblance to the attacker.{/n}

languages.text: {n}被袭击的贵族的脸因恐惧而扭曲，你很难看出来他的脸上是否缝着别人的脸，也看不出来他的脸与袭击者的脸有没有相似之处。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman's visage is twisted in a grimace of terror. It is difficult to tell whether he has another person's face sewn onto his own or not — or if he bears any family resemblance to the attacker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}被袭击的贵族的脸因恐惧而扭曲，你很难看出来他的脸上是否缝着别人的脸，也看不出来他的脸与袭击者的脸有没有相似之处。{/n}

languages.text: {n}その貴族の容貌は恐怖にひきつっていた。彼の顔に他人の顔が縫い付けられているのか、それとも襲撃者と血縁関係があるのか、判別するのは難しい。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman's visage is twisted in a grimace of terror. It is difficult to tell whether he has another person's face sewn onto his own or not — or if he bears any family resemblance to the attacker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その貴族の容貌は恐怖にひきつっていた。彼の顔に他人の顔が縫い付けられているのか、それとも襲撃者と血縁関係があるのか、判別するのは難しい。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El rostro del noble es una mueca de terror. Es difícil saber si tiene cosida la cara de otra persona o no, o si tiene parecido familiar alguno con su atacante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman's visage is twisted in a grimace of terror. It is difficult to tell whether he has another person's face sewn onto his own or not — or if he bears any family resemblance to the attacker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro del noble es una mueca de terror. Es difícil saber si tiene cosida la cara de otra persona o no, o si tiene parecido familiar alguno con su atacante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soylunun yüz kasları dehşetle kasılıyor. Yüzüne başkasının yüzünün dikilip dikilmediğini veya saldırganla herhangi bir benzerliği olup olmadığını söylemek güç.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman's visage is twisted in a grimace of terror. It is difficult to tell whether he has another person's face sewn onto his own or not — or if he bears any family resemblance to the attacker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soylunun yüz kasları dehşetle kasılıyor. Yüzüne başkasının yüzünün dikilip dikilmediğini veya saldırganla herhangi bir benzerliği olup olmadığını söylemek güç.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une grimace de terreur déforme le visage du noble. Difficile de savoir s'il s'est cousu le visage d'une autre personne sur le sien, ou même s'il existe un quelconque air de famille entre lui et son agresseur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman's visage is twisted in a grimace of terror. It is difficult to tell whether he has another person's face sewn onto his own or not — or if he bears any family resemblance to the attacker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une grimace de terreur déforme le visage du noble. Difficile de savoir s'il s'est cousu le visage d'une autre personne sur le sien, ou même s'il existe un quelconque air de famille entre lui et son agresseur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Adelige verzieht sein Gesicht zu einer entsetzten Grimasse. Es ist schwer zu sagen, ob er sich das Gesicht einer anderen Person angeeignet hat ... oder ob er dem Angreifer ähnlich sieht.{/n}
